headline: Block to Announce Third Quarter 2025 Results
summary: DISTRIBUTED-WORK-MODEL/OAKLAND, Calif., October 09, 2025--Block, Inc. (NYSE: XYZ) will release financial results for the third quarter of 2025 on Thursday, November 6, 2025, after market close. Block will also host a conference call and earnings webcast at 2:00 p.m. Pacific Time / 5:00 p.m. Eastern Time on the same day to discuss these results.

headline: “Working on It”: Senator Lummis Backs Jack Dorsey’s Push for a Bitcoin Tax Exemption
summary: U.S. Senator Cynthia Lummis (R-WY) is developing legislation to exempt small Bitcoin transactions from capital gains taxes, a move inspired by Jack Dorsey’s call to make Bitcoin usable for everyday payments. The proposal seeks to remove the tax burden on minor crypto purchases, such as buying coffee or groceries, which ...

headline: Unusual Options Activity: Bullish Traders on Block Could Explore These 2 Strategies
summary: Among the 1,311 unusually active options in Wednesday's trading, Block had six with Vol/OI ratios higher than 1.24 and expiring in seven days or more. Two particular options’ strategies come to mind for bullish investors.
